Name: Neptune
Introduction: Neptune is the farthest planet from the Sun and another ice giant in the solar system. It has a deep blue color, primarily due to the presence of methane in its atmosphere. Neptune is known for its strong winds and the Great Dark Spot, a storm system similar to Jupiter's Great Red Spot. It has a ring system and 14 known moons, including Triton, which is the largest moon and exhibits unique retrograde motion.
